creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: snow-covered purple and pink mountain in background; band of silhouetted pine trees in middle ground; meadow with rocks, pink and yellow blossoms, and curving river reflecting mountain in foreground
marks: left, cursive jizuri: 自摺　大正拾四年作 {Jizuri, Taishō ju LLC:  よし田  {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Mount Rainier
